title: August 1st coveted corner unit downtown Denver-UTILITIES INCLUDED
posting_body: Available August 1st
(furnished and utilities included), coveted corner unit in Denver at the Jeff Park Flats-2729 W. 28th Ave. #401.
Option to come unfurnished as well.
Location is quiet and safe, great for working at home, yet walkable to central downtown and other popular areas.
Grocery stores, coffee shops, restaurants, breweries/bars, parks all practically around the corner.
Two minutes puts you on the major highway I-25 with easy access to the greater Denver area and the rest of Colorado.
Truly this is the best location in Denver for walkability and/or getting in your car to get out of the city quickly.
**There's a rooftop terrace with couches, fire pits, dinner table, bbq and spectacular views of the city.
The building was completed in November 2019 with sound proofing, security and modern design in mind.

The unit comes fully furnished with modern appliances- queen size bed, black out curtains, washer/dryer unit, six burner gas stove, french door refrigerator, bar counter with stools, smart thermostat (A/C and heat), among others.
Plenty of space for your things with a walk-in closet and locked private storage in the basement.
It is a larger corner condo sharing a side with only one neighbor, located on the fourth floor with partial views of the city and mountains.
** Single bedroom, one bath condo-unit, monthly rent: $2,300.00.
Monthly rent includes gas, water, trash, and internet (electricity not included), and one private reserved parking spot in a fully enclosed garage.
Access to the building and garage requires a fob or garage door opener.
**** Please contact me with any questions and complete an application if you are interested.
Security deposit is $2,300.00.
Flexible on tour times.
The term of the lease is negotiable: monthly rent includes gas, water, trash, all HOA dues and internet.
Additional costs Tenant will be responsible for are private renters insurance and monthly electricity.
1-year lease for $2,300 a month.
2-year lease for $2,250 a month.
Month to month lease for $2,500 a month.
Option to rent furnished or unfurnished.
Interested applicats can review the full terms of the lease upon request.
